@ garyoak99:

If you're running Spybot S&D (or any other program that blocks any process from changing the host file), turn that option off in tools->IE tweaks->"Lock Hosts file read-only as protection against hijackers".
SAME as socker_conny stops when u get the knife.. what should i we do any solution? Mbb15?

@ socker_conny & lime195:

You're supposed to select your assassin's blade. I've found that it doesn't work if you select it through the weapon wheel, and you need to press its hotkey (default is 2).

This isn't working for me.  When I run AC2 launcher as an administrator I get 2 options, normal mode and local mode.  Normal mode goes to a screen saying "Checking Assassin's Creed 2 Installation" and stops there, I have waited for ages and nothing happens.  When I try local mode, it starts to launch the game and looks like it is about to work, but then I get "An active internet connection is required to play this game" (I am still connected to the internet).  Can anyone help?

Ignore my last comment, it's working now.  I added the information

127.0.0.1       static3.cdn.ubi.com
127.0.0.1       ubisoft-orbit.s3.amazonaws.com
127.0.0.1       onlineconfigservice.ubi.com
127.0.0.1       orbitservice.ubi.com
127.0.0.1       ubisoft-orbit-savegames.s3.amazonaws.com

to my hosts file (windows\system32\drivers\etc) and it took a long time to launch, but then it worked.  Thanks, and keep fighting the ubisoft restrictive DRM!  Fuck ubisoft!
